entities.label: United Nations Interim Administration Mission in Kosovo

edges.label: 1. Investigation Initiated By
edges.tooltip: UNMIK initiated the investigation into misappropriation of funds at Pristina Airport.

edges.label: 2. Managed By
edges.tooltip: The Pristina Airport Manager was responsible for overseeing operations at Pristina International Airport.

edges.label: 3. Subject of Investigation
edges.tooltip: The manager was investigated for alleged misappropriation of funds.

edges.label: 4. Violation of Regulations
edges.tooltip: The manager violated procurement regulations by not conducting a tender process.

edges.label: 5. Insurance Procurement
edges.tooltip: Insurance coverage was procured from a Berlin-based company without a tender process.

edges.label: 6. Contract Period
edges.tooltip: Insurance Company 1 provided coverage from 2003-10-02 to 2004-10-01.

edges.label: 7. New Insurance Coverage
edges.tooltip: Insurance Company 2 commenced coverage on 2004-04-01, leading to double insurance.

edges.label: 8. Violation Found
edges.tooltip: The investigation found violations of the UNMIK regulation 1999/2.

Pristina Airport Manager: Failure to invite international tenders for insurance coverage during 2002-2003.
Double insurance coverage for Pristina Airport starting on 1 April 2004.

UNMIK regulation 1999/2: Negligence in adhering to competitive tendering as per public procurement guidelines.
